title: Chapter XXI - Metropolitan Transportation Authority
content:
Chapter XXI - Metropolitan Transportation Authority

State Regulations

Subchapter A - All-agency Rules And Regulations (Part 1000 to 1016)

Subchapter B - Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority (Part 1020 to 1032)

Subchapter C - New York City Transit Authority, Manhattan And Bronx Surface Transit Operating Authority And Staten Island Rapid Transit Operating Authority Paratransit Rules (Part 1035)

Subchapter D - Rules and Regulations Governing the Conduct and Safety of the Public (Part 1040 to 1097)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
